data.title: Liverpool Football Club sponsorship
data.meta_description: We’re proud to have our name featured on Liverpool FC’s iconic red shirts. Discover how Standard Chartered sponsor and support LFC both on and off the pitch.
data.text:
Sponsorships

We stand with Liverpool FC

Since 2010, we’ve been the proud Main Club Partner of one the world’s most iconic clubs

The perfect match

We’re proud to sponsor one of the world’s most legendary clubs. And after more than a decade of partnership running until the end of May 2027, we’re in it for the long haul, too – including investing more in LFC Women.

Welkom Arne

We’re excited to welcome Arne Slot as the new Head Coach at Liverpool FC. He replaces Jürgen Klopp, who left in May after 9 years.

Empowering girls through sport

When girls play on, they succeed. We’ve teamed up with Liverpool FC to inspire more girls to stay in sport.

Discover our ‘Play On’ campaign

Find out more about how sport empowers women and girls – and what we’re doing to encourage them to play on.

Play on: Train the Trainer

Learn about, watch and share our latest ‘Play On’ videos – a series of 4 short films highlighting our Train the Trainer curriculum.

From the Shoulders of Giants

Pioneers of football

In our From the Shoulders of Giants series, we hear from the pioneering women who fought to overturn the English ban on women’s football. Watch the first episode, ‘Under the radar,’ now.

When Bill met Billy

Our CEO Bill Winters recently met with Liverpool FC CEO Billy Hogan to discuss the secrets of our successful long-term partnership.
